title: Hand Crossbow Proficiency
content:
Proficiency Information

Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Hand Crossbows.

How to unlock Hand Crossbow Proficiency

Hand Crossbow Proficiency can be acquired by

Bard Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Drow

Hand Crossbow Proficiency Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here

Traits and Features Ability Drain ♦ Abjuration Savant ♦ Absorb Elements ♦ Acolyte of Nature ♦ Action Surge ♦ Adamantine Skin ♦ Additional Ki Point ♦ Additional Proficiencies ♦ Additional Rage Charge ♦ Advanced Unarmoured Movement ♦
